words.source: H7725 shuv, Hiphil imperative 2ms; KJV 'Put', ESV 'Put', NASB 'Put … back'
H3027 yad, noun fs + 2ms suffix; KJV 'thine hand', ESV/NASB 'your hand'
H413 ʾel, preposition; KJV 'into', ESV 'inside', NASB 'into'
H2436 cheq, noun ms + 2ms suffix; KJV 'thy bosom', ESV 'your cloak', NASB 'your bosom' — DIVERGENT: ESV 'cloak' vs KJV/NASB 'bosom'
H7725 shuv, Hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'he put', ESV 'he put', NASB 'he put … back'
H3027 yad, noun fs + 3ms suffix; KJV/ESV/NASB 'his hand'
H2436 cheq, noun ms + 3ms suffix; KJV 'his bosom', ESV 'his cloak', NASB 'his bosom'
H3318 yatsaʾ, Hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms + 3fs suffix; KJV 'he plucked it out', ESV 'he took it out', NASB 'he took it out' — DIVERGENT: KJV 'plucked' vs ESV/NASB 'took'
H2436 cheq, noun ms + preposition min + 3ms suffix; KJV 'of his bosom', ESV 'of his cloak', NASB 'from his bosom'
H2009 hinneh, interjection + waw; KJV 'and, behold', ESV 'and behold', NASB 'and behold'
H7725 shuv, Qal qatal 3fs; KJV 'turned again', ESV 'was restored', NASB 'was restored' — DIVERGENT: KJV literal 'turned again' vs ESV/NASB dynamic 'was restored'
H1320 basar, noun ms + preposition ke + 3ms suffix; KJV 'as his other flesh', ESV 'like the rest of his flesh', NASB 'like the rest of his flesh'
